attributes.action: Restrict the law against cruelty to badgers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Badgers in urban cities and towns are very destructive, especially to vegetable gardens. Could the law be amended to allow for rehoming badgers as at the moment nothing can be done but see our gardens destroyed by the lovely mammals. As much as we do not wish to harm animals, there must be some protection for people's properties too.
